ygData.subject: Re: **SPOILER**Re: [warriors_eq] Brutechopper info and **spoiler**
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm...I be thinking those halflings won t be liking me much. I ve made a habit of stopping by their camps in Nektulos Forest whenever I come home. Bael
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm...I be thinking those halflings won't be liking me much.

I've made a habit of stopping by their camps in Nektulos Forest whenever I
come home.

Bael
Tier'dal Warrior of the Indigo Brotherhood
"Who wants to see my lucky halfling foot?"


-----Original Message-----
From: Dean Boyle <gino_14@...>
To: warriors_eq@onelist.com <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, June 10, 1999 3:53 PM
Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] **SPOILER**Re: [warriors_eq] Brutechopper info
and **spoiler**


>From: Dean Boyle <gino_14@...>
>
>Ok, this ight sound wierd but I know where tog et a ruby...
>
>RiverVale go into the pond and hunt a trout, kill it and it fropes a red
>ruby.. dosn't sell more then a few gold but I know it's a ruby (red color)
>
>
>----Original Message Follows----
>From: "Tom Swift" <tswift@...>
>Reply-To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
>To: <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
>Subject: [warriors_eq] **SPOILER**Re: [warriors_eq] Brutechopper info and
>**spoiler**
>Date: Wed, 9 Jun 1999 11:28:17 -0400
>
>From: "Tom Swift" <tswift@...>
>
>Do not read further if ye seek to discover and complete the quest on your
>own.
>
>
>Down for spoiler
>
>**SPOILER ALERT**
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>Brutechopper is obtained from an NPC named Lindyun (or something similar)
in
>Innothule swamp. She is a troll, and didn't have a problem with my dark
elf,
>but any barbarians or dwarves should probably /con her before getting to
>close. Talking to her will reveal she has a love of rubies. If you give
her
>one she will give you one of two items. Brutechopper or Midnight Maul.
They
>are both lore items and having either one in your inventory means she will
>not give you either one.
>
>I do not know where to obtain a ruby other than to buy one for 130p-175p
>depending on faction and charisma. If anyone can tell me what mob might
>drop a ruby I would be grateful.
>
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: D. Richard Moss <rmoss@...>
>To: warriors_eq@onelist.com <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
>Date: Wednesday, June 09, 1999 11:11 AM
>Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Brutechopper info and **spoiler**
>
>
> >From: "D. Richard Moss" <rmoss@...>
> >
> >Aye, please post the details =)
> >
> >Woad
> >Barbarian Warrior, The Rathe
> >----- Original Message -----
> >From: Tom Swift
> >To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> >Sent: Wednesday, June 09, 1999 10:02 AM
> >Subject: [warriors_eq] Brutechopper info and **spoiler**
> >
> >
> >I know how to get the Brutechopper now.
> >
> >Damage 16 and delay of 50. I dont' recall the weight off hand.
> >It is a quest and lore item, and completing this quest gives you a 50/50
> >shot of getting the Brutechopper or Midnight Maul.
> >
> >The quest takes place in Innothule swamp and the weapon and quest is only
> >for Ogres, Trolls, Barbarians, and Dwarves (3 Large races and one
small?).
> >
> >I will post more details if anyone desires. I do not know if a "good"
race
> >can complete the quest.
> >
